CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( "https://www.google.com/maps/place/" + IF( OR(TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Ophalen ingepland", TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Opgehaald", TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Ophaling ingepland"), Ophaaladres1__Street__s + "," + Ophaaladres1__PostalCode__s + "," + Ophaaladres1__City__s, IF( OR(TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Terugbrengen ingepland", TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Teruggebracht", TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Levering ingepland"), Afleveradres1__Street__s + "," + Afleveradres1__PostalCode__s + "," + Afleveradres1__City__s, IF( TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Ingepland", Projectadres1__Street__s + "," + Projectadres1__PostalCode__s + "," + Projectadres1__City__s, IF( ISBLANK(Account__r.PersonContact.MailingStreet), Account__r.ShippingStreet, Account__r.PersonContact.MailingStreet ) + "," + IF( ISBLANK(Account__r.PersonContact.MailingCity), Account__r.ShippingCity, Account__r.PersonContact.MailingCity ) ) ) ), IF( OR(TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Ophalen ingepland", TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Opgehaald", TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Ophaling ingepland"), Ophaaladres1__Street__s + BR() + Ophaaladres1__PostalCode__s + " "+ Ophaaladres1__City__s, IF( OR(TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Terugbrengen ingepland", TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Teruggebracht", TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Levering ingepland"), Afleveradres1__Street__s + BR() + Afleveradres1__PostalCode__s +" "+ Afleveradres1__City__s, IF( OR(TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Ingepland", TEXT(Werk_Order_Status__c) = "Afgerond"), Projectadres1__Street__s + BR() + Projectadres1__PostalCode__s +" "+ Projectadres1__City__s, "Navigeer" ) ) ) , "Open in Google Maps")
CustomField.label: Navigeer
